title: The Higher Law
credit_line: Patrons Art Fund: gift of Mr. and Mrs. John F. Walton, Jr
provenance_text: Captain Charles W. Batchelor, Pittsburgh [1823-1896], by 1864; Captain Lawrence, Port Washington, NY, before 1950; Hirschl and Adler Galleries and Newhouse Galleries, New York, 1950; Private collection, after 1950; Hirschl and Adler Galleries, New York, by 1958; Museum purchase: gift of Mr. and Mrs. John F. Walton, 1958

creator.birth_place: East Liverpool (Columbiana county, Ohio, United States)
